data.title: Jeremy Sisto
data.text:
AKA Jeremy Merton Sisto

Born: 6-Oct-1974

Birthplace: Grass Valley, CA

Gender: Male

Race or Ethnicity: White

Sexual orientation: Straight

Occupation: Actor

Nationality: United States

Executive summary: Billy Chenowith on Six Feet Under

Father: Dick Sisto (jazz musician)

Mother: Reedy Gibbs (actress)

Sister: Meadow Sisto (actress, b. 30-Sep-1972)

Girlfriend: Reese Witherspoon (actress, together 1991-92)

Wife: Marisa Ryan (actress, m. 30-Aug-1993, div. 21-Jun-2002)

Wife: Addie Lane (m. 13-Oct-2009, one daughter, one son)

Daughter: Charlie Ballerina Sisto (b. 23-Jun-2009)

Son: Bastian Kick Sisto (b. 9-Mar-2012)

University: University of California at Los Angeles (dropped out)

Kucinich for President

TELEVISION

Suburgatory George Altman (2011-)

Law & Order Det. Cyrus Lupo (2007-10)

Kidnapped Knapp (2006-07)

Six Feet Under Billy Chenowith (bipolar, 2001)
